text: Costs and fees for services rendered by the Register of Wills and chargeable to others than the United States or the District of Columbia are payable in advance and shall be collected pursuant to such rules and regulations, not incompatible with law, as are prescribed by the court.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 15-704.

1973 Ed., § 15-704.

DC CODE § 15-704

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Judgments and Executions; Fees and Costs. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Advance payment of costs and fees.
